data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Picea abies (Norway spruce) from sample CR-91

Exposition NE, Slope 20 deg, Geology: Anstehender Kalk, av. Tree height 20 m, Tree cover 40%, Shrub cover 30%, Herb cover 25%, Vegatation type: Flachgr. feucht. Fi-Sto. Schlucht. Wen. wexp. , Film number: 587A
